attributes.action: Save the Coors Visitor Centre (formerly the Bass Museum of Brewing)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Coors Visitor Centre (formerly the Bass Museum) in Burton-upon-Trent is threatened with closure at the end of June 2008 by its current owners, Coors Brewers Ltd. This will result in the loss of a major visitor attraction in Burton-upon-Trent and the loss of many unique artifacts illustrating the town's heritage, which will be re-located to other Coors sites around the world.
We, the undersigned, call upon HM Government to take any and all necessary steps to save this vital part of the heritage of the town and of brewing in the UK and to protect the area's economy.
